ingredients.item: 1 Waitrose & Partners Free Range Omega 3 Rich Egg
35g slice Waitrose & Partners Mixed Olive Ficelle bread

instructions.step: Bring a pan of water to the boil. Lower in the egg; reduce to a simmer for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, toast the bread. Mash the butter and anchovy paste together and spread over the hot toast. Sprinkle with chives and slice into soldiers. Serve alongside the egg.
